description: Hidden, looted, saved: the scientific research and conservation of a group of Begram Ivories from the National Museum of Afghanistan Emma Passmore, Janet Ambers, Catherine Higgitt, Clare Ward, Barbara Wills, St John Simpson and Caroline Cartwright Hidden, looted, saved: the scientific research and conservation of a group of Begram Ivories from the National Museum of Afghanistan
